title: Bug 17423 - Revert option appears twice in the popup menu
description: There are two Revert options in the menu.
OB: When I open a Java editor and access the popup menu, I can see that the Revert option appears twice.
EB: I expect that the Revert option should only appear once in the popup menu.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Access the popup menu. You will notice that the Revert option appears twice, one after UNDO and another before FORMAT.
